glosses: used when the speaker perceives an action as incomplete that the listener was supposed to perform

examples.text: hani dedin benden başka kimseyi sevmediğini?
examples.translation: didn't you say you didn't love anyone but me?
weren't you gonna do your homework?

glosses: a town and district of Diyarbakır Province, Turkey

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish خانی (hani, “big red fish”), from Greek χάννη (chánni, “serranus hepatus”).
